submission_files.description: Phase 1: Extracted key points of the paper including problem statement, core innovation, technical contributions, and quantitative results
Phase 2: Complete methodology extraction including MA Separation architecture, parallelization strategies, synchronization mechanisms, and implementation details
Phase 3: Comprehensive experimental setup, results, and analysis including all quantitative metrics and performance comparisons
Final concise paper retaining original abstract and all key sections while condensing unnecessary parts
Complete deployment configuration with JSON format specifying parallel strategies, module divisions, device mappings, and all parameters for MA Separation and baseline models
